p: Acetonitrile (99.9%), n-hexane (95%), and ethyl acetate (99.8%) were of HPLC grade from Fisher Scientific (Lisbon, Portugal). All the individual compounds were of HPLC or GC grade, the fatty acids methyl ester (FAME) reference standard mixture 37 (standard 47,885-U) was purchased from Sigma (St. Louis, MO, USA), as well as other individual fatty acid isomers, l-ascorbic acid, tocopherols (α-, β-, γ-, and δ-isoforms), and sugars ( d(–)-fructose, d(+)-glucose anhydrous, d(+)-melezitose hydrate, d(+)-sucrose, and d(+)-trehalose). All other chemicals and solvents were of analytical grade purity and purchased from common suppliers. Water was treated in a Milli-Q water purification system (TGI Pure Water Systems, Greenville, SC, USA).
